Definition: You will be shown text describing {Biological Summary} along with a protein. Your job is to determine if the shown protein is {Relationship Summary} that the text describes. {Task-Specific Relationship}You may only output yes or no. If the protein shown is the one described, you should respond yes. Otherwise, you should respond no.
Task-Specific Relationship: An enzyme of a drug is a protein which catalyzes chemical reactions involving the given drug (substrate).
